body_html:
after adding a lock to global step, I didn't meet stuck problem.
but I got error when running vgg benchmark code, maybe my network environment is a little unstable.

2017-07-26 21:21:26.691844: F tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.cc:683] Check failed: status.ok() RecvLocalAsync was not ok, key/job:worker/replica:0/task:2/gpu:1;b0903effc6e4881e;/job:ps/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0;edge_2493_Mul_1;0:0;138139939197237012 error message: Step 138139939197237012

after adding  a lock to global step, I didn't meet stuck problem.
but I got error when running vgg benchmark code, maybe my network environment is a little unstable.

body:
after adding  a lock to `global step`, I didn't meet stuck problem.
but I got error when running vgg benchmark code, maybe my network environment is a little unstable.
